abstract: It could be called the Iron Triangle Cup, a 24-team street soccer tournament pitting the best players from Queens auto shops in a concrete expanse known as Mad Max Stadium.
snippet: It could be called the Iron Triangle Cup, a 24-team street soccer tournament pitting the best players from Queens auto shops in a concrete expanse known as Mad Max Stadium.
lead_paragraph: They call it Mad Max Stadium, a cleared-out junkyard enclosed by tall walls of corrugated metal.

headline.main: In a Willets Pt. Junkyard, Soccer Claims Eminent Domain
